name: Impossible Escape (kren3)
description:
A short puzzle platformer game where you are an adventurer that was questing for the pendant of immortality. You have succeeded in your venture! If you spend a few seconds concentrating on it, it will bind you to the mortal relm. Should you perish you shall return to the bound location unharmed. After rebirth you need to repeat the ritual or you will not be so lucky next time!

Unfortunately the path behind you has collapsed, but you are certain there is another way out. 

Good luck!
